name: pr-comment-generator
description: Generate PR comments based on git information

prCommentGenerator.template.default:
Please generate a pull request description with the following template, remember only output markdown content so that I can copy and paste it into the description:

```
## Objective

**What is your objective for this Pull Request?**

## Changes

**Changes that you made in this Pull Request.**

## Jira Link

****If this Pull Request is related to a Jira ticket, no need to add link, ticket number is enough. eg. CMS-###**

## Type of Pull Request

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug Fix
- [ ] Enhancement
- [ ] Refactor

## Checklist

- [ ] If I added new functionality, I added tests covering it.
- [ ] If I fixed a bug, I added a regression test to prevent the bug from silently reappearing again.
- [ ] I checked whether I should update the docs and did so if necessary.
```

Use the following git information to generate the description, the branch info may also include Jira ticket number, so please make sure to include that in the description::

Branch Information:
- Current Branch: {currentBranch}
- Target Branch: {targetBranch}
- Jira Ticket: {jiraTicket}

Commit Messages:
{commitMessages}

Git Diff:
{diff}
prCommentGenerator.template.description: Template for generating PR comments. Available placeholders: {currentBranch}, {targetBranch}, {jiraTicket}, {commitMessages}, {diff}

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
